name: Alien Construction Skills
description:
Control UFO's with your VR Controllers and impress primitive humans with your construction skills. Note: HTC Vive VR headset Required

Alien Construction Skills places you in command of a pair of shiny Builder-class UFOs. Use your tractor beam to rearrange giant stone blocks and to levitate humans to solve building puzzles. Be careful, as humans have no chitinous exoskeleton and are easily squished or dropped.

  • Three ancient civilizations to impress: Stonehenge Druid Hippies, Mesoamerican Jungle Folk, and Egyptian Sarcophaguys.
  • Push floating humans around with your saucers
  • If you get bored of the puzzles, you can juggle stone blocks.

This was originally a submission for LudumDare 36 game jam, but it has a number of bugfixes, tuning improvements and better graphics, sound and music. But it is more of a mini-game, so it's set to pay-what-you-want since there's a limited amount of content.
